mainEntity.name: What organic farming services does Himalaya Krishi provide?

acceptedAnswer.text: Himalaya Krishi provides comprehensive organic farming services including training programs, certification support, agricultural consultancy, sustainable farming workshops, and organic farming resources. We also offer specialized programs in crop management, soil health, and pest control using organic methods.

mainEntity.name: How can I get organic certification through Himalaya Krishi?

acceptedAnswer.text: Our organic certification support service includes initial assessment, documentation guidance, compliance training, and ongoing support throughout the certification process. We help farmers meet both national and international organic standards.

mainEntity.name: What sustainable farming techniques do you teach?

acceptedAnswer.text: We teach various sustainable farming techniques including crop rotation, composting, natural pest management, water conservation, soil fertility management, and integrated farming systems. Our methods combine traditional knowledge with modern organic farming practices.
